title: Anastasia Romanov - Private Detective
description: Things have changed for Anastasia in the last few years and she is now a teenager dealing with bigger issues. Series III is aimed at young adult/teens upwards.This is the second book in Series III where she says goodbye to old friends and meets some new ones along the way. Join Anastasia in her new adventures as a teenage detective.Anastasia Romanov finds herself in a strange place with strange people. Will they help her to rescue the two, kidnapped children? Will she make it out alive? Anastasiaâ€™s luck may just have run out...
author: Fergus Wilson
